configs:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS qc_configs;CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `qc_configs` (
  `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `sitename` tinytext,
  `domain` tinytext,
  `port` varchar(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  `keywords` text,
  `description` text,
  `icon` text,
  `comment` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL,
  `style` varchar(32) DEFAULT '',
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=2 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

INSERT INTO `qc_configs` (`id`,`sitename`,`domain`,`port`,`keywords`,`description`,`icon`,`comment`,`style`) VALUES (1,'QuickCms','domain','3000','QuickCms,网站,移动,app','QuickCms致力于开发高端网站,App而设计,推动您的想象力','/upload/g4td18lJJNORSB3ydeOkyqSQ.png','1','simple');
contents:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS qc_content_about;CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `qc_content_about` (
  `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `title` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL,
  `category` text,
  `postdate` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL,
  `router` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL,
  `tags` text,
  `up` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL,
  `views` int(12) DEFAULT NULL,
  `guid` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL,
  `author` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL,
  `field_1` text,
  `field_2` text,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=2 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

INSERT INTO `qc_content_about` (`id`,`title`,`category`,`postdate`,`router`,`tags`,`up`,`views`,`guid`,`author`,`field_1`,`field_2`) VALUES (1,'关于','2','2017-02-25 23:32',NULL,'','1488039784641',1,'album','admin','展示一些摄影作品以及分享 一些心情','/upload/79JQflWCxZ_v00fCVBHmogiN.png,/upload/oPrm6O0QqS7CokDNxGXGyac2.png,/upload/whWootbo7ALTeTQ26d__agtw.png,/upload/bx_rE3LGn5zlZpcgS3DWt7s0.png,/upload/ZCoreyy7akxg-JsO_PYxwdnt.png,/upload/zf72zXh_umwTE21ClhWWyexH.png');

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS qc_content_article;CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `qc_content_article` (
  `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `title` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL,
  `category` text,
  `postdate` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL,
  `router` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL,
  `tags` text,
  `up` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL,
  `views` int(12) DEFAULT NULL,
  `guid` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL,
  `author` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL,
  `field_1` text,
  `field_2` longtext,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS qc_content_news;CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `qc_content_news` (
  `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `title` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL,
  `category` text,
  `postdate` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL,
  `router` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL,
  `tags` text,
  `up` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL,
  `views` int(12) DEFAULT NULL,
  `guid` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL,
  `author` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL,
  `field_1` text,
  `field_2` text,
  `field_3` longtext,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=2 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

INSERT INTO `qc_content_news` (`id`,`title`,`category`,`postdate`,`router`,`tags`,`up`,`views`,`guid`,`author`,`field_1`,`field_2`,`field_3`) VALUES (1,'欢迎使用QuickCms','1','2017-02-25 20:23',NULL,'新闻,文章','1488026370631',41,'news','admin','Lorumipsum dolar sit amet','/upload/w79lYSrlVLHpx53WD4PCiRxU.png','');

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS qc_content_shops;CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `qc_content_shops` (
  `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `title` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL,
  `category` text,
  `postdate` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL,
  `router` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL,
  `tags` text,
  `up` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL,
  `views` int(12) DEFAULT NULL,
  `guid` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL,
  `author` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL,
  `field_1` text,
  `field_2` text,
  `field_3` text,
  `field_4` text,
  `field_5` text,
  `field_6` text,
  `field_7` longtext,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

DROP TABLE IF EXISTS qc_content_works;CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `qc_content_works` (
  `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `title` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL,
  `category` text,
  `postdate` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL,
  `router` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL,
  `tags` text,
  `up` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL,
  `views` int(12) DEFAULT NULL,
  `guid` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL,
  `author` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL,
  `field_1` text,
  `field_2` text,
  `field_3` text,
  `field_4` text,
  `field_5` text,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=28 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;

users:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS qc_users;CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `qc_users` (
  `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `username` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL,
  `nickname` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL,
  `groups` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL,
  `styles` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL,
  `email` tinytext,
  `avatar` tinytext,
  `password` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL,
  `posts` varchar(20) DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`)
) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=4 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8;
extensions:
DROP TABLE IF EXISTS qc_extensions;CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `qc_extensions` ( `id` int(11) unsigned NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `icon` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL, `name` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL, `guid` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL, `status` enum('normal','cancel') DEFAULT NULL, `versions` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL, `postsubject` text, `description` text, `layers` text, `configs` text, `datas` longtext, `actions` longtext, `query` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL, `input` varchar(32) DEFAULT NULL, `inputlimit` varchar(11) DEFAULT NULL, `dependencies` tinytext, PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB AUTO_INCREMENT=24 DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8; INSERT INTO `qc_extensions` (`id`,`icon`,`name`,`guid`,`status`,`versions`,`postsubject`,`description`,`layers`,`configs`,`datas`,`actions`,`query`,`input`,`inputlimit`,`dependencies`) VALUES (22,'dns','数据备份','backup','normal','1.0.0','备份整站数据','使用数据备份拓展,可以用来备份网站数据','','null','{}','','null','upload','2000','null'); INSERT INTO `qc_extensions` (`id`,`icon`,`name`,`guid`,`status`,`versions`,`postsubject`,`description`,`layers`,`configs`,`datas`,`actions`,`query`,`input`,`inputlimit`,`dependencies`) VALUES (23,'device_hub','Api中心','apicenter','normal','1.0.0','通过Api中心调取数据','使用Api中心调取数据 模板语法使用ejs
直接访问的地址可通过访问/jsonp/地址 或者 /api/地址 进行json数据直接调用','','null','{categories:{views:{params:{page:\'页码\',count:\'数量\',keywords:\'关键字\',filter:\'筛选\',sort:\'排序\'},infomations:{categories:\'分类数据\',modelconfigs:\'模型数据\',contents:\'该分类下的列表数据\',pageContainer:\'分页信息\',style:\'当前分类的信息数据\'},system:{sitename:\'网站名称\',domain:\'域名\',port:\'端口\',keywords:\'关键字\',description:\'网站描述\',icon:\'图标\',style:\'默认样式\',},position:{arr:\'面包屑信息\'},path:\'样式目录\'},get:{params:{page:\'页码\',count:\'数量\',keywords:\'关键字\',filter:\'筛选\',sort:\'排序\',callback:\'回调\'},categories:\'分类数据\',modelconfigs:\'模型数据\',contents:\'该分类下的列表数据\',pageContainer:\'分页信息\'},post:{params:{page:\'页码\',count:\'数量\',keywords:\'关键字\',filter:\'筛选\',sort:\'排序\'},categories:\'分类数据\',modelconfigs:\'模型数据\',contents:\'该分类下的列表数据\',pageContainer:\'分页信息\'}},contents:{views:{params:{},title:\'标题\',infomations:{categories:\'分类数据\',modelconfigs:\'模型数据\',lists:\'同分类下列表\',index:\'当前内容索引\',contents:\'内容数据\',pageContainer:\'分页信息\',style:\'当前分类的信息数据\'},system:{sitename:\'网站名称\',domain:\'域名\',port:\'端口\',keywords:\'关键字\',description:\'网站描述\',icon:\'图标\',style:\'默认样式\',},position:{arr:\'面包屑信息\'},path:\'样式目录\'},get:{params:{callback:\'回调\'},categories:\'分类数据\',modelconfigs:\'模型数据\',lists:\'同分类下列表\',index:\'当前内容索引\',contents:\'内容数据\',pageContainer:\'分页信息\',style:\'当前分类的信息数据\'},post:{params:{},categories:\'分类数据\',modelconfigs:\'模型数据\',lists:\'同分类下列表\',index:\'当前内容索引\',contents:\'内容数据\',pageContainer:\'分页信息\',style:\'当前分类的信息数据\'}}}','null','null','null','2000','null');
